trans-unit.source: Indicates the window style to use for the invoked program when calling the <see langword="Shell" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="Shell" /> 函数时用于被调用程序的窗口样式。

trans-unit.source: When you issue `Shell` commands, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当发出`Shell`可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员的命令。

trans-unit.source: The `Style` argument takes the `AppWinStyle` enumeration members.
Window is hidden and focus is passed to the hidden window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口被隐藏，且焦点传递至隐藏的窗口。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbHide" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbHide" />。
窗口最大化，且具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbMaximizedFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbMaximizedFocus" />。

trans-unit.source: Window is displayed as an icon with focus.
trans-unit.target: 窗口显示为一个具有焦点的图标。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbMinimizedFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbMinimizedFocus" />。

trans-unit.source: Window is displayed as an icon.
The currently active window remains active.
trans-unit.target: 当前活动的窗口仍保持活动状态。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbMinimizedNoFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbMinimizedNoFocus" />。

trans-unit.source: Window has focus and is restored to its original size and position.
trans-unit.target: 窗口具有焦点，且还原至其原始大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbNormalFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbNormalFocus" />。

trans-unit.source: Window is restored to its most recent size and position.
trans-unit.target: 窗口还原至其最近的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The currently active window remains active.
trans-unit.target: 当前活动的窗口仍保持活动状态。

trans-unit.source: This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbNormalNoFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员等效于 Visual Basic 常量 <see langword="vbNormalNoFocus" />。
